subject: Football
Concussions
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: On the same day the N.F.L. instructed officials to eject players who delivered helmet-to-helmet hits, three  college football players sustained injuries from hits involving the helmet. None of the plays drew penalties.
snippet: On the same day the N.F.L. instructed officials to eject players who delivered helmet-to-helmet hits, three  college football players sustained injuries from hits involving the helmet. None of the plays drew penalties.
